ios.sim.debug.build: RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true xcodebuild -workspace template/ios/HelloWorld.xcworkspace -scheme HelloWorld -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath template/ios/build -quiet
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 12

android.emu.release.local.build: cd template/android; DETOX=true ./gradlew app:assembleRelease app:assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release --no-daemon; cd -
android.emu.release.local.name: Pixel_4_API_29

android.emu.release.build: cd template/android; DETOX=true ./gradlew app:assembleRelease app:assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release --no-daemon; cd -
android.emu.release.name: Nexus_6_API_29
